statements: DELETE FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE company_name = 'Example Company'
DELETE FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE id = 1 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp'
DELETE FROM RegulatoryChanges WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA' AND compliance_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'Example Company'
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_id = 10 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement = 'Environmental Compliance';
DELETE FROM regulatory_history WHERE company_id = 1 AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
